data.text: Magi e weche mag Agur wuod Jake, ma gin weche matut.
Chutho afuwo ahinya ma ok awinjora bedo dhano;
Ok asepuonjora rieko,
En ngʼa mosedhi e polo kendo olor piny?
“Wach ka wach moa kuom Nyasaye en adier;
Kik imed gimoro e wachne,
“Gik moko ariyo makwayi; yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Mi wuond gi miriambo obed mabor koda;
Nimar, ka ok kamano, to anyalo bedo gi mwandu mangʼeny mi akwedi
“Kik iwuo marach kuom jatich ne ngʼat mondike
“Nitie jogo makwongʼo wuonegi
jogo ma paro giwegi ni giler
jogo ma wangʼ-gi tek masungore,
joma lekegi chalo gi ligangla
“Chwe nigi nyiri ariyo.
Gin liel,
“Wangʼ ma jaro wuoro,
“Nitie gik moko adek mamiya awuoro ahinya,
Yor ongo e kor polo,
“Ma e yor dhako ma jachode:
“Nitie gik moko adek mateto piny,
misumba modoko ruodh piny,
moro en dhako ma ok oher to okende
“Gik moko angʼwen matindo ni e piny,
Biye gin chwech ma tekregi tin,
aidha bende gin le man-gi teko matin,
kata bonyo onge ruodhgi,
Kamano olele bende inyalo mako gi lwedo,
“Nitie gik moko adek ma wuodhgi lich ka irango,
Sibuor, en ratego moloyo kuom le duto, kendo onge gimoro moluoro,
thuon gweno magar ka dwaro gwere
“Ka isetimo tim fuwo ma imiyori duongʼ kendi,
Mana kaka puoyo chak kelo mo,
